Container.Name: machinaris-chives
Container.Overview:
Adds on farming of the Chives blockchain to the main Machinaris application, alongside Chia.
PREREQUISITE: Machinaris application, containing Chia blockchain, which this Chives container will register with.
INSTALL: Set the host path to first directory containing plots using '/plots' Path. Add more Paths for additional host directories. Also be sure to set the LAN IP address of your Unraid server in the controller_host and worker_host variables.
SETUP: After first-launch of this Chives container, _copy_ your mnemonic pass-phrase (found in your main Machinaris install at /mnt/user/appdata/machinaris/mnemonic.txt) over to this /mnt/user/appdata/machinaris-chives/mnemonic.txt file in place and restart this container. Finally, don't forget to port-forward tcp/6888 at your router. SUPPORT: Join the Discord server for fastest response: https://discord.gg/mX4AtMTt87 Ask a question or start a discussion on Github: https://github.com/guydavis/machinaris/discussions

Config.Name: appdata
Config.Description: Holds app data for the container. Not for temp plotting or final plot storage.

Config.Name: plots
Config.Description: Holds completed plots for farming. Create more Paths for additional folders like plots1,plots2,etc...

Config.Name: plotting
Config.Description: Your fast temp space for plotting, ideally a cache pool or unassigned SSD.

Config.Name: plots_dir
Config.Description: A colon-separated list of all in-container paths (defined above) holding your completed plots. Example: /plots:/plots1:/plots2

Config.Name: controller_host
Config.Description: The IP address of your Unraid server on your LAN for controller/worker communication.

Config.Name: worker_host
Config.Description: The IP address of your Unraid server on your LAN for controller/worker communication.

Config.Name: worker_api_port
Config.Description: The TCP port of the Machinaris worker for controller/worker communication.

Config.Name: worker_port
Config.Description: The TCP port to reach this worker at. Leave at 8931 for Chives blockchain.

Config.Name: protocol_port
Config.Description: The TCP port for connecting to peers. Port forward at your router.

Config.Name: rpc_port
Config.Description: The TCP port allowing harvesters to connect with on your LAN. DO NOT port forward at your router.

Config.Name: mode
Config.Description: Determines which services Machinaris starts. Default is everything (aka fullnode).

Config.Name: blockchains
Config.Description: The blockchain to farm. Leave set to 'chives'.
